lyrics.text:
‘Oku ai ha katoanga
Kuo teu ‘e he ‘Otua,
Ma’a e kakai mavisa
‘I māmani kotoa pē.

Pea ‘oku ‘ia Sīsū
Ko e ‘Alo, hono tauhi,
Pea ‘oku tāu mo ia
Ko e ‘Eiki lelei lahi.

Ko e tala katoanga
‘A ‘ene kau talafekau,
Ki he kakai ‘oku mo’ua
‘I he’enau ‘angahia.

Mou ha’u ki he katoanga
‘A e kau tu’utamaki,
Kuo teu ‘e he ‘Otua
‘I he’ene Kosipeli.

‘A e kau mo’ulaloa
‘I he ngaahi ‘angahala,
Mou ha’u ki he katoanga
Kuo teu mo’omoutolu.

Mou ha’u ‘o ma’u ‘ia Sīsū
‘A e fakamolemole,
Pea mo e loto fo’ou
Mo e Laumālie lelei.
